text: Newburgh is a city located in Orange County, New York, United States, north of New York City, and south of Albany, on the Hudson River. It is the location of Washington's Headquarters. Interstate 84 goes very close to the city. There is a long history of racism in Newburgh and the Hudson Valley. During the COVID-19 pandemic, there was rioting in Newburgh because the police killed a black person. ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Newburgh Website Category:Cities in New York (state)
title: Newburgh, New York
